cyclone.name: CLAUDETTE
cyclone.current_location: about 475 miles south of Morgan City, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: moving north toward the north-central Gulf Coast, then forecast to sweep northeastward across the southeastern United States
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: north-central Gulf Coast (near the south-central Louisiana coast)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch/Warning area extends from Intracoastal City, LA to the AL/FL border including Lake Pontchartrain, Lake Maurepas and metropolitan New Orleans
weather_observation.warning_coast: Intracoastal City, Louisiana to the Alabama/Florida border including Lake Pontchartrain, Lake Maurepas, and metropolitan New Orleans
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Gulf Coast of Louisiana, Mississippi and Alabama
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None (no Northeast or Mid-Atlantic station listed in wind-probability table)
